div.head: 服石毒發
div.div: outbreak of poisoning after ingesting [stalactite] mineral

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: outbreak of poisoning after ingesting [stalactite] mineral

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with ru shi fa 乳石發 , outbreak of stalactite mineral [poisoning]. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry wan dou 豌豆 quoting Wai tai mi yao 外台秘要 38: 一切石發 , “All outbreaks of mineral [poisoning]”, writes: 服石毒發 , “ Outbreak of poisoning after ingesting [stalactite] mineral ”.
